Learn more Bring your own device and save Get 100GB plus a bonus 25GB of 5G+ data from $65/mo. with the pre-authorized payment discount. View offer Get a FREE 55" Samsung 4K HDR Smart TV Plus, get a $100 bill credit (including taxes). Just order Internet & Optik TV on a 2 year term. View offer TV & Entertainment Close Products & Services Explore Optik TV Plans Bundles How it works Hardware What to Watch Streaming Sports On demand TV Apps All channels Explore Stream+ Explore Gaming Xbox Game Pass Ultimate Move your services Switch to TELUS Get a FREE 55" Samsung 4K HDR Smart TV Plus, get a $100 bill credit (including taxes). Just order Internet & Optik TV on a 2 year term. View offer Score the ultimate goal with our Internet and TV bundle from $115 per month Bundle Optik TV and PureFibre internet. Enjoy Netflix, Hayu, Prime Video and live TV from only $115 per month. View offer Get Netflix, Disney+ and Amazon Prime from just $23 per month with Stream+ Easily transfer over your current streaming subscriptions to Stream+ and save 15%. View offer Security & Smart Home Close Products & Services SmartEnergy SmartHome Security How it works Plans Products Recommend a plan Existing security equipment Online Security Plans Prevention Detection Recovery Custom Home Custom Security SmartWear Security Plans and safety devices Expert home tech services Move your services Monitor your home from anywhere with TELUS HomeView for $18/mo. Get live video feeds, alerts and a $100 device discount on any TELUS smart camera with HomeView for just $18/mo. on a 3-year term Learn more Online exclusive: Our Ultimate plan is now $18/mo. For a limited time, save on Ultimate protection for your personal and financial data. Help keep your information safe with this exclusive online offer. View our plans Get $1300 of smart security equipment on us When you order the Control + Video plan. Installation or kit fee applies. View deal Health Close Products & Services Virtual healthcare See a doctor virtually Counsellors Psychologists Dietitians TELUS Health Care Centres For members For everyone Find a Care Centre TELUS Healthy Living Network Virtual pet care See a vet virtually Virtual pharmacy Download the app FAQ Medical alert system In the home On the go Plans Help prevent identity theft starting at $12/mo. Protect your private information wherever you go with TELUS Online Security, powered by Norton™. Get a plan today to help keep your online activities private and your devices safe. View our plans Discover TELUS Health Medical Alert Worry less with a state-of-the-art fall detection device, starting from $50 /mo. for existing TELUS customers. Learn more Get healthcare from home TELUS Health MyCare™ lets you see a doctor*, mental health counsellor or dietitian from your phone, where and when it’s convenient for you. Learn more TELUS Rewards Anniversary Sale Search Button Cart has 0 items Cart Cart has 0 items Cart Click here to find out how the potential Canada Post Strike may impact your order Home / Mobility / Phones / Apple iPhone 15 Pro Save the $70 connection fee when you shop Mobility online. #onetrust-consent-sdk, #onetrust-consent-sdk * {
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    font-family: -apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,"Segoe UI",Roboto,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif !important;
}
#onetrust-banner-sdk {
    border-top: 1px solid #b3b9be !important;
}
#onetrust-banner-sdk:focus {
    border: 0 !important;
}
#onetrust-banner-sdk > div {
    margin: 0px auto !important;
    max-width: 1200px !important;
    padding: 20px !important;
    position: relative !important;
    width: 100% !important;
}
#onetrust-group-container {
    display: block !important;
}
#onetrust-policy {
    margin: 0 !important;
}
#onetrust-button-group-parent {
    display: block !important;
    float: right !important;
    max-width: 310px !important;
    min-width: 300px !important;
    padding: 0 0 0 20px !important;
    width: 30% !important;
}
#onetrust-banner-sdk.vertical-align-content #onetrust-button-group-parent {
    position: relative !important;
    top: 0 !important;
    left: 0 !important;
    transform: none !important;
}
#onetrust-button-group {
    margin: 0 !important;
    width: 100% !important;
}
#onetrust-button-group button {
    border: 1px solid #2b8000 !important;
    border-radius: 36px !important;
    font-size: 16px !important;
    padding: 12px 32px !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
    width: 250px !important;
}
#onetrust-button-group button:hover {
    opacity: 1 !important;
}
#onetrust-button-group button#onetrust-pc-btn-handler {
    margin: 0 0 16px !important;
}
#onetrust-pc-btn-handler {
    background: #fff !important;
    color: #2b8000 !important;
    margin: 0 0 16px !important;
}
#onetrust-pc-btn-handler:hover {
    background: #fff !important;
    border: 1px solid #2d5a1a !important;
    color: #2d5a1a !important;
}
#onetrust-reject-all-handler,
#onetrust-accept-btn-handler {
    background: #2b8000 !important;
    border: 1px solid #2b8000 !important;
    color: #fff !important;
}
#onetrust-button-group button#onetrust-reject-all-handler {
    margin: 0 0 16px !important;
}
#onetrust-reject-all-handler:hover,
#onetrust-accept-btn-handler:hover {
    background: #2d5a1a !important;
    border: 1px solid #2d5a1a !important;
}
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-close-btn-container {
    top: 6px !important;
    transform: none !important;
}
#onetrust-close-btn-container button {
    background: transparent url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,') 50% 50% no-repeat !important;
    right: 0 !important;
}
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-policy-text {
    font-size: 14px !important;
    line-height: 20px !important;
}
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-policy-text a {
    font-weight: normal !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
}
#ot-sdk-btn-floating .ot-floating-button__back {
    background: #2b8000 !important;
}
#ot-sdk-btn-floating.ot-floating-button button {
    padding: 3px 0 0 !important;
}
@media only screen and (min-width: 400px) and (max-width: 896px) {
    #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-button-group-parent {
        margin-left: 0 !important;
        position: relative !important;
        width: 100% !important;
    }

    #onetrust-banner-sdk .onetrust-close-btn-ui {
        right: 0 !important;
        top: 0 !important;
    }
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 897px) and (max-width: 1023px) {
    #onetrust-banner-sdk.vertical-align-content #onetrust-button-group-parent {
        left: 0 !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
        position: relative !important;
        top: 0 !important;
        transform: none !important;
    }
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 1024px) {
    #onetrust-banner-sdk.vertical-align-content #onetrust-button-group-parent {
        position: relative !important;
        top: 0 !important;
        left: 0 !important;
        transform: none !important;
    }
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 1280px) {
    #onetrust-banner-sdk:not(.ot-iab-2).vertical-align-content #onetrust-button-group-parent {
        left: auto !important;
        position: relative !important;
    }
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 782px) {
    #onetrust-group-container {
        display: block !important;
        float: none !important;
        width: 95% !important;
    }
    #onetrust-button-group-parent {
        float: none !important;
        display: block !important;
        margin: 20px 0 0 0 !important;
        max-width: none !important;
        padding: 0 !important;
        width: 100% !important;
    }
    #onetrust-button-group button {
        max-width: none !important;
        width: 100% !important;
    }
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 783px) and (max-width: 804px) {

        width: 55% !important;
    }
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 805px) and (max-width: 912px) {

    }

            /* Preferences Centre */
#onetrust-consent-sdk, #onetrust-consent-sdk * {
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    font-family: -apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,"Segoe UI",Roboto,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk #close-pc-btn-handler.ot-close-icon {
    background: url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,') 50% 50% no-repeat !important;
    margin: 0;
    top: 0 !important;
}

.ot-pc-header {
    border: 0 !important;
}

.ot-pc-logo {
    display: none !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk #ot-pc-content {
    margin: 10px 0px 0 30px !important;
    padding: 0 12px 0 2px !important;
    top: 8px !important;
    width: calc(100% - 74px) !important;
}

h2#ot-pc-title {
    font-size: 24px !important;
    font-weight: 500 !important;
    margin: 0 0 10px !important;
}

#accept-recommended-btn-handler {
    display: none !important;
}

#ot-pc-desc {
    font-size: 16px !important;
    line-height: 24px !important;
    margin: 0 0 20px !important;
}

#ot-pc-desc a {
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#ot-pc-desc a:hover {
    color: #2b8000 !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk #ot-pc-content {
    bottom: 97px !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-btn-container {
    padding: 30px !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .save-preference-btn-handler {
    border: 2px solid #2b8000 !important;
    border-radius: 36px !important;
    font-size: 16px !important;
    letter-spacing: 0px !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
    max-width: 245px;
    min-width: 225px;
    padding: 12px 32px !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .save-preference-btn-handler:hover {
    background: #2d5a1a !important;
    border: 2px solid #2d5a1a !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk button:hover {
    opacity: 1 !important;
}

h3#ot-category-title {
    display: none !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-plus-minus {
    background: url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,') 50% 50% no-repeat !important;
    background-size: 16px !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk button[aria-expanded=true]~.ot-acc-hdr .ot-plus-minus {
    transform: rotate(180deg) !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-cat-header,
#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-cat-grp .ot-always-active {
    font-size: 16px !important;
    font-weight: 600 !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-tgl input:checked+.ot-switch .ot-switch-nob:before {
    background: #fff url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,') 50% 50% no-repeat !important;
    background-size: 10px !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-plus-minus span {
    display: none !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-tgl input:checked+.ot-switch .ot-switch-nob {
    background: #2b8000 !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-accordion-layout.ot-cat-item:first-of-type {
    border: 0px !important;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8 !important;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-accordion-layout.ot-cat-item {
    border: 0px !important;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8 !important;
}

#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-acc-grpcntr.ot-acc-txt,

<script>

  // Create an instance
  const init3D = new CustomEvent('channel-html:3djs:init');

  window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
      window.dispatchEvent(init3D);

      // Change color
    const colorOptionTarget = () => document.querySelector('.product-color__option--selected')

    const changeColor = () => {
        const selectedColor = colorOptionTarget()?.getAttribute('title')

        window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('channel-html:3djs:changeDefaultSelected', { 'detail': {'selectedColor': selectedColor}}))
    }

    changeColor()

    const colorOptionObserver = new MutationObserver(() => {
        changeColor()
     });

    colorOptionObserver.observe(colorOptionTarget(), { attributes: true, attributeFilter: ['class'] })
  });

  window.addEventListener('3dpv:event', (event) => {
    window.dataLayer.event = {name: 'iPhone 3D View', action: 'click', details: event.detail.key.replace('click:', '')}

// Alloy events
})
</script>

class="List__StyledListItem-ju21tg-0 eXIVVG">The $70 savings is a waiving of our $70 connection fee. Offer applicable online only on Mobility orders for smartphones, connected devices (ie. tablets, smartwatches) and Bring Your Own Device plans. Offer applicable to Mobility consumer accounts only. Offer not applicable to Business, Corporate or EPP account types.</li><li class="List__StyledListItem-ju21tg-0 eXIVVG">Offer is available for new subscribers with an eligible device for a limited time only. Plan automatically renews at your region’s price per month until cancelled. No purchase necessary for current owners of eligible devices. Restrictions and other terms apply. See <a href="https://www.apple.com/ca/promo/" class="Link__StyledLink-sc-1bokult-0 fnOgMg">apple.com/ca/promo</a>
for more information.
</li><li class="List__StyledListItem-ju21tg-0 eXIVVG">5G access requires a connection to TELUS’ 5G network. The TELUS 5G network is available in select areas. Visit our <a href="https://www.telus.com/mobility/network/coverage-map" class="Link__StyledLink-sc-1bokult-0 fnOgMg">coverage map</a> for details.</li><li class="List__StyledListItem-ju21tg-0 eXIVVG">Subject to approved credit with a 24-month TELUS Easy PaymentⓇ agreement (0% APR) on any in-market plan with data and voice included. TELUS Easy PaymentⓇ balance will be repaid over a 24 month period via equal monthly payments. Payment of any outstanding TELUS Easy PaymentⓇ balance due upon termination, or account transfer. Applicable taxes are calculated based on the total no term price less any device discounts and must be paid in full at the time of purchase. Pay-per-use charges (including long distance, roaming and additional airtime or data) are extra. Device purchased on the Bring it Back program must be returned in good working condition or you will be responsible for the difference between the Bring-It-Back program amount and the lower trade-in value for a device that is not in good working condition. Trade-in standards published at the time a device is returned will apply. Applicable sales taxes are due at time of purchase on the full purchase price. You will not be charged tax on the Bring-It-Back Program Amount if you choose to keep your device and pay back the Bring-It-Back Program Amount at, or before, the end of the 24 month term. Bring-It-Back program is only available while you subscribe to mobility service. If mobility service is cancelled before the end of the term, the Bring-It-Back Program Amount will be charged to your TELUS bill.</li><li class="List__StyledListItem-ju21tg-0 eXIVVG">Up to $310 trade in credit available to TELUS wireless customers who activate or renew on a iPhone 15 128GB smartphone on a 2 year plan and who trade in an eligible device. Trade-in a iPhone 13 128GB valued at $310. Devices traded online will receive Trade-in value in bill credits. Limit of one trade in per customer. Trade-in value will be confirmed upon in-store evaluation. In-store trade in credits have no cash value, are non-transferable and can only be used when activating or renewing service in the TELUS store where the device was traded in at the time of the trade in. Products purchased using in-store trade in credits cannot be returned for full cash value. All trade-ins are final. The trade in transfers all rights in the device to HYLA Mobile ULC or TELUS Retail Limited (d.b.a. Mobile Klinik) and waives any claim against TELUS, Mobile Klinik and HYLA Mobile ULC with respect to the device or the trade in program. The trade-in program is available in Canada only and may be cancelled at any time without notice. Trade-In value is dependent on the condition of the device being traded in.</li><li class="List__StyledListItem-ju21tg-0 eXIVVG">Eligibility requirements apply. Activate a 5G+ Unlimited Canada-US-Mexico-Caribbean rate plan and get first per line connected device for $0/mo. Applicable to tablets when you bring your own device or finance on a 2 year term. Applicable to watches when you finance on a 2 year term. Addition of the connected device can be done in a TELUS store or via call center. Offer subject to change without notice. You must remain on your 5G+ Unlimited Canada-US-Mexico-Caribbean rate plan to keep a $0/mo connected device. Regular price is currently $15/mo and subject to change without notice.
</li><li class="List__StyledListItem-ju21tg-0 eXIVVG">To be eligible for Family discounts, at least two subscribers on an account must be on an unlimited plan. Only the subscribers on unlimited plans are eligible to receive the discounts. Discounts are as follows: $7.50 per line per month for two lines, $10 per line per month for three lines and $15 per line per month for four to nine lines. Discounts will be updated when subscribers are added or removed on an account. Consumer accounts only.</li></ol></div></div></div></div></div></div><hr class="HairlineDivider__StyledHairlineDivider-biamlk-0 gZHAWe"></div><div><div><div class="Footnote__StyledFootnote-sc-13cmol-0
